column2: Job   Title:  Staff Nurse (OT) Experience:  1-5 Yrs Location:  Anjanapura Job   Type:  Full Time About   Recoup: Recoup Health is a fast-growing healthcare delivery company that is transforming how healthcare is delivered to employees across the globe. Our mission is to develop the fastest And most sensitive primary care on the planet, limited only by the science of the human body. We do this by gathering the brightest minds in medicine and engineering to work on Cutting-edge healthcare & technology. We are extremely proud to be working on this and we hope you will be too. Job   Summary :  We are looking for an experienced and compassionate Staff Nurse to join our team at Recoup Hospital. The Staff Nurse will be responsible for providing quality patient care, administering medications, and monitoring patient progress. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication and organizational skills, a strong work ethic, and the ability to work independently. Key   Responsibility:  Provide quality patient care in accordance with hospital policies and procedures  Administer medications and monitor patient progress  Document patient care and progress in medical records  Educate patients and families about health care and treatments  Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to ensure quality patient care  Maintain a safe and clean environment Requirements:  Bachelor's Degree in Nursing or equivalent  Current nursing license in good standing  At least 2 years of experience in a hospital setting  Excellent communication and organizational skills  Ability to work independently and as part of a team  Knowledge of medical terminology and procedures

column2: Do you dream of embarking on a rewarding nursing career in Germany? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you at Makro-Mikro Consulting, the best nurse recruitment company in Germany. About the role We at Makro-Mikro Consulting, are currently seeking qualified Nurses from India to join our Germany Placement Program. As a Nurse with Makro-Mikro Consulting, you will have the perfect opportunity to work with the prestigious Retirement, Old age & Nursing homes across Germany.  An important part of the program is the willingness & the ability to learn German language (B1 level & higher) to be able to effectively communicate with the health professionals in Germany. Job Responsibilities   Conduct thorough assessments of patients' physical, emotional, and psychological health, including vital signs, medical history, and current symptoms, to formulate individualized care plans.  Provide compassionate and evidence-based nursing care to patients across the lifespan, addressing their diverse healthcare needs and promoting optimal health outcomes.  Administer medications and treatments as prescribed by healthcare providers, ensuring accurate dosage, proper administration techniques, and monitoring for adverse reactions.  Educate patients and their families about health conditions, treatment options, medication management, preventive care measures, and lifestyle modifications to empower them to take control of their health.  Collaborate with interdisciplinary healthcare teams, including physicians, therapists, pharmacists, and social workers, to coordinate patient care, facilitate continuity of care, and achieve holistic health outcomes.  Maintain accurate and comprehensive patient records, including assessment findings, care plans, interventions, and outcomes, in compliance with legal and regulatory standards.  Provide emotional support, reassurance, and comfort to patients and their families during challenging times, demonstrating empathy, active listening, and therapeutic communication skills.  Adhere to ethical principles and professional standards of nursing practice, maintaining confidentiality, respecting patients' autonomy and dignity, and upholding the highest level of integrity in all interactions.   We are recruiting nurses across various disciplines. Applicants need to fulfil the following criteria: Candidate Requirements  Bachelor's degree in Nursing or Diploma in General Nursing & Midwifery (GNM) from an accredited nursing institution in India recognized by INC  Valid nursing license from India.  Freshers with no experience are also eligible  Proficiency in English, both written and spoken  Minimum B1 German language certificate from Goethe, OSD, TELC or ECL  Nurses who have passed B1 German Level or very close to passing B1 German Level will be preferred  Freshers in German language should have the willingness to undergo online German language training provided by Makro-Mikro Consulting.  Must be below 35 years of age  Ability to adapt to a new cultural and healthcare environment. Strong interpersonal and communication skills Perks and Benefits   Fully employer-sponsored program - No hidden charges  All inclusive support for Visa, work permit, permanent contract & unique consulting services  Securing a Full-time Job in Germany   Expected Salary for the first 3 months-2650 Euros (gross)  Minimum Basic Salary of 3250 Euro(gross) after full recognition  Complete assessment and guidance provided to become a Registered nurse in Germany  B2 German Language Certification and Training is provided by Makro-Mikro Consulting absolutely free  Full documentation support  Flight Charges covered by company   End to end support throughout the process right from your job application till we onboard you in Germany  An assistant to support during the arrival in Germany Apply now & get your golden ticket to Germany! Interested candidate may share their cv at  priti.srivastava@makro-mikro.eu or  may call at +91-9717666981  for any queries or concerns.

column2: Location    :  Remote(work from home) Shift time  :  Night shift - 6.30 pm to 3.30 am We are a US-based company seeking medically trained staff based at US. As a Medical Virtual Assistant(MVA), you will work directly with our clients -- doctors and other medical professionals based in the USA. We help our clients improve workflow, save time, and remove the burden of in-room documentation.  Our goal is to help you succeed in this up-and-coming field of medical documentation and healthcare virtual assisting. Join the OPX Global family and apply today! Virtual Medical Assistants or Remote Medical Assistants are executives who perform administrative tasks for healthcare practitioners. Virtual Medical Assistants allow Doctors to focus more on their patients and improve Patient Satisfaction. They act as an extension of the Healthcare providers medical back-office team by providing Record Keeping, Customer Service, Billing and Accounting and EMR Management.  Role & responsibilities     Attend to patient communications and interaction (phone/email/video) Live virtual scribing Respond to inquiries about healthcare services/tasks Manage Appointments, rescheduling and cancellations.  Gather medical or insurance information. Answer inbound calls and make outbound calls to providers and members regarding authorization request status Complete Patient Charts and Input medical information in new chart Coordinate with the internal team and provide desired patient information Receive new patient referral from clients Obtain all necessary documentation required to process referrals and requests for covered  services  EMR Management - Ensure EMR is always up to date. Edit and Modify as needed. Order Prescriptions Patient Triage Handle administrative tasks/back-office in a medical setting Qualifications: l A graduate of any Nursing/Healthcare degree. l Proven experience as a Medical Virtual Assistant  l Familiarity with EHR/EMR systems and HIPAA compliance. l  High proficiency in English (US Accent added advantage)  l Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail . l Language proficiency, experience in call center for US clients is preferred I A typing speed of at least 50 wpm and the ability to accurately handle large volumes of data    efficiently. I Proficiency in MS Office and the ability to quickly learn new systems and tools. l Able to support a Work from Home setup l Own PC/laptop (Minimum of i3 processor, 4 gig RAM) l Internet speed should be 100 mbps l Being tech savvy is a plus.

column2: B B Memorial Hospital is looking for INFECTION CONTROL NURSE to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       An Infection Control Nurse is a specialized healthcare professional who is responsible for preventing and controlling the spread of infections within healthcare settings     They play a crucial role in ensuring patient safety and reducing the risk of healthcare-associated infections     Here are some key responsibilities of an Infection Control Nurse:Developing and implementing infection control policies and procedures: Infection Control Nurses work closely with healthcare administrators, physicians, and other healthcare workers to develop comprehensive infection control policies and protocols     They ensure that these policies comply with local, state, and federal regulations and are based on current evidence-based practices     Monitoring infection control practices: Infection Control Nurses conduct regular surveillance to monitor healthcare-associated infections and identify any trends or outbreaks     They review patient records, laboratory reports, and other relevant data to track infections and evaluate the effectiveness of prevention strategies     Educating healthcare staff: Infection Control Nurses provide ongoing education and training to healthcare workers regarding infection control measures, including hand hygiene, personal protective equipment (PPE) usage, proper sterilization and disinfection techniques, and isolation precautions     They also keep staff updated on new developments and guidelines in infection control     Implementing and evaluating infection prevention measures: Infection Control Nurses are responsible for ensuring that proper infection control measures are implemented throughout the healthcare facility     This includes monitoring hand hygiene compliance, environmental cleaning and disinfection practices, proper handling and disposal of infectious waste, and adherence to standard precautions and transmission-based precautions     Investigating outbreaks and incidents: Infection Control Nurses conduct thorough investigations when there are outbreaks or incidents of healthcare-associated infections     They collaborate with other healthcare professionals to identify the source of the infection, implement appropriate control measures, and prevent further spread

column2: St. Johns Research Institute is looking for Junior Nurse - ICMR to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       The Junior Nurse in the ICMR TB Vaccine Study is responsible for providing nursing care and support in the context of a research study focused on tuberculosis (TB) vaccines     The role involves working closely with a multidisciplinary team to ensure the smooth implementation of the study protocols       Key Responsibilities:       Patient Care:Administering vaccines and medications as per the study protocols     Monitoring and recording vital signs of study participants     Providing basic healthcare and responding to participant inquiries     Data Collection:Accurate and timely documentation of patient data     Ensuring compliance with data collection procedures and protocols     Study Support:Assisting in the recruitment and retention of study participants     Collaborating with other team members to facilitate the smooth execution of the study     Communication:Communicating effectively with study participants and their families     Collaborating with healthcare professionals, researchers, and study coordinators     Compliance and Ethics:Adhering to ethical standards and guidelines in research     Ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and study protocols       Qualifications and Skills:       Nursing degree/diploma from a recognized institution     Registered Nurse license     Previous experience in clinical research or relevant healthcare setting     Knowledge of TB and vaccination protocols is an asset     Good communication skills and ability to work in a team

column2: MediVaah is looking for Nursing Tutor/ Nursing Educator to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Curriculum Development: Collaborate with curriculum development teams to design, review, and update nursing education programs, courses, and learning objectives based on industry standards, regulatory requirements, and evidence-based practices      Instructional Delivery: Deliver lectures, seminars, and interactive learning sessions to nursing students, covering a wide range of topics including anatomy, physiology, pharmacology, nursing theory, clinical skills, and patient assessment      Clinical Supervision: Provide hands-on supervision and guidance to nursing students during clinical rotations and practicum experiences, ensuring adherence to nursing protocols, ethical standards, and patient safety guidelines      Clinical Competency Assessment: Assess and evaluate the clinical competence, critical thinking abilities, and communication skills of nursing students through performance evaluations, skills assessments, and clinical simulations      Facilitation of Active Learning: Engage nursing students in active learning methodologies such as case studies, group discussions, role-playing exercises, and clinical simulations to foster critical thinking, problem-solving, and clinical reasoning skills      Mentorship and Advising: Serve as a mentor and academic advisor to nursing students, providing guidance, support, and career counseling on academic progress, professional development, and licensure requirements      Evaluation and Feedback: Provide constructive feedback and evaluations to nursing students on their academic performance, clinical practice, and professional behavior, identifying areas for improvement and developing individualized learning plans      Continuing Education: Pursue ongoing professional development opportunities, attend nursing conferences, workshops, and seminars, and stay abreast of current trends, research findings, and best practices in nursing education and healthcare delivery      Interdisciplinary Collaboration: Collaborate with nursing faculty, clinical preceptors, healthcare professionals, and community partners to facilitate interdisciplinary learning experiences, promote interprofessional communication, and enhance patient-centered care delivery      Research and Scholarship: Engage in scholarly activities such as research projects, publications, and presentations to contribute to the advancement of nursing science, evidence-based practice, and educational innovation

column2: Avron Hospitals Pvt Ltd is looking for Nursing Educator to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey       The Nursing Educator plays a crucial role in the development and implementation of educational programs designed to train and mentor nursing staff     They are responsible for assessing educational needs, designing curricula, delivering instruction, and evaluating outcomes to ensure that nurses acquire and maintain the necessary skills and knowledge to provide high-quality patient care     Key Responsibilities:Curriculum Development: Develop, review, and update educational curricula based on best practices, evidence-based guidelines, and regulatory requirements     Tailor curriculum to meet the needs of various levels of nursing staff     Instructional Delivery: Deliver engaging and interactive educational sessions using a variety of instructional methods, such as lectures, case studies, simulations, and hands-on training     Utilize technology and multimedia resources effectively in teaching     Assessment and Evaluation: Assess learning needs and competency levels of nursing staff through various methods, including pre-tests, observation, and skills assessments     Evaluate the effectiveness of educational programs through post-tests, surveys, and feedback mechanisms     Mentorship and Support: Provide mentorship and support to nursing staff to enhance their professional development and clinical competence     Offer guidance on career advancement opportunities, continuing education, and specialty certifications     Collaboration: Collaborate with nursing leadership, clinical educators, and other healthcare professionals to coordinate educational activities and ensure alignment with organizational goals and initiatives     Participate in interdisciplinary committees and task forces related to nursing education and quality improvement     Professional Development: Stay abreast of current trends, research, and innovations in nursing education and healthcare delivery     Attend conferences, workshops, and continuing education programs to enhance personal and professional growth     Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of educational activities, including attendance, evaluations, and competency assessments     Prepare reports and summaries to communicate outcomes and achievements to stakeholders and regulatory agencies as required     Compliance and Quality Assurance: Ensure compliance with regulatory standards, accreditation requirements, and institutional policies related to nursing education     Participate in quality assurance activities to monitor and improve the effectiveness of educational programs
